abstract: Top deal-makers expect the environment for mergers to continue improving for the rest of 2011, according to a survey released ahead of the Tulane Corporate Law Institute n New Orleans.
snippet: Top deal-makers expect the environment for mergers to continue improving for the rest of 2011, according to a survey released ahead of the Tulane Corporate Law Institute n New Orleans.
lead_paragraph: Deal-makers are by their very nature an optimistic lot. And as many of the top legal specialists in the field head down to the annual Tulane Corporate Law Institute in New Orleans on Wednesday, it appears that their confidence is rising.

headline.main: More Good Times Ahead for M.&A., Survey Finds

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
